wikipedia_page.main: Leonard Charles "Len" Rowland (23 June 1925 – May 2014) was an English footballer who played as a left-back. He played in the English football league for Wrexham and Stockport County.He later played for Winsford United before signing for Mossley in the 1960–61 season.He also won 6 caps for the England national amateur football team.
